name: Very Important Top Secret Mission
description:
This is my first game, made for Mini Jam 91 : UFO over the course of ~12 hrs. The finished product is a far stretch from a complete game, but I had a fun time learning so many different things during the process, and I'm sure that I will be able to build on that for my next project.

Music from Magenteal at https://soundcloud.com/user-37508791 and sound effects are from mixkit.co. Everything else was developed from scratch in Unity.
